subject: Re: [junit] How to access a private method declared inside a  private inner class?
msgSnippet: Please read the JUnit FAQ. Google JUnit FAQ . ... J. B. Rainsberger, President, Diaspar Software Services Let s write software that people understand.
messageBody:
